headline: Retail sales show US consumer spending holds up, but 'almost everyone' is looking for deals
summary: Best Buy CEO Corie Barry told Yahoo Finance, "We see almost everyone looking for value now."

headline: Best Buy CEO: Consumer spending, AI innovation, new marketplace
summary: Best Buy (BBY) CEO Corie Barry sits down with Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma to discuss consumer spending trends, the impact of macroeconomic factors like interest rates, artificial intelligence (AI) innovation, the strategy behind Best Buy's new marketplace offering, and more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: 2 Consumer Stocks Worth Your Attention and 1 Facing Headwinds
summary: Retailers are evolving to meet the expectations of modern, tech-savvy shoppers. Digitization has been one of the keys to staying competitive against e-commerce rivals, a move that has enabled the industry to grow same-store sales. Consequently, retail stocks have climbed 21.5% over the past six months, beating the S&P 500 by 5 percentage points.
